name: Computing-club
body:
### Welcome to the Educational Psychology Computing Club Website.
Here we will keep you informed, as well as, post materials and links from our bi-monthly meetings. Happy computing.

### Fall 2014 Schedule

The meetings will take place in EdSciB Room 10 from 11:30am–12:30pm

| Sept 8   | Introduction to RStudio                                                   |
|----------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Sept. 22 | Easy, Beautiful R Documents: R Markdown                                   |
| Oct. 6   | Data Preparation I: Subsetting and Merging                                |
| Oct. 20  | Data Preparation II: Filters, Transformations & Summarization using dplyr |
| Nov. 3   | Data Preparation III: Reshaping Data                                      |
| Nov. 17  | Using the Whole Process                                                   |


We will also host two R `code-a-thons` during the semester. These will be focused on writing functions to add to our R library. (More information to come.)

Get it on your Google Calendar [click here]


### Materials


### Contact Information
For additional information, or to get on our mailing list, contact Kory (vuexx199@umn.edu), Kyle (nicko013@umn.edu), or Andy (zief0002@umn.edu).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
